title: Jason Torchinsky (Jalopnik!)
description:
Jason Torchinsky is the Senior Editor of Jalopnik.com. He's known for reviewing strange cars, his excellent dissection of designs, the industry, and coming up with weird concepts. He also has collection of VERY odd cars, including a brand new EV he bought on Alibaba for less than $1000. He is full of hilarious ideas, stories, and adventures. 

Read his writing: https://jalopnik.com/author/jasontorch

@JasonTorchinsky

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman

 

Watch the show!:  https://youtu.be/W3a4_qAeNKY
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
